content.detailedDescription:
In november 1990 we were traveling east bound on the m53 to visit friends right opposite bidston tip.As we were passing the tip on the motorway i noticed to my right a ufo and said to my partner you dont believe in ufos then well what the hell is that.

we could see it very clear as it was still daylight and the disc  was dome shaped  and was a brown bronze colour it was moving west along the motorway pass the tip very low and moving slowly.I have a very clear memory of it and my wife.Other people must have seen it and just not reported it like me.

we had a very clear view of it and seen it for the whole time we were on the motorway we couldnt stop and had to keep moving till it went out of sight behind us.
content.summary: My wife and i were travelling west bound on the m53 looked to my right and there clear as day light is a bronze colour disc craft travelling east as if it was following the motorway.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house just helping out in hemel and i went for a cigaret and i heard the noise of a plane and looked in to the sky and saw what i thought was a plain but it wasn't shaped like a plane and it was black in colour and i knew it wasn't a plane because of the apperance and it just kept moving around in the same area then just acsendedout of the planets atmosphere which got me excited and i'm gutted that i didn't have anythingto video or capture the momment
content.summary: I heard very faint plane noise looked up and i saw ufo moved around in the same area then acsending out of the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with our yard man. i heard geese flying over. i looked up to watch them and above them was a cigar shaped bright white object traveling at an extremely fast speed. no wings. it made no sound, no com trail and was heading se in the direction of new orleans from my house. it only took a few seconds before it was out of sight. i knew immediately it was not a jet or airliner we are on the flight plan to new oeleans i see commercial airliners on their decent into no all the time. we also own an air patrol service so i am familiar with aircraft. this was not an airplane. it was early morning and sky was clear. one small wispy cloud only. i fully believe i saw an ufo. tried to show to my yard man but it was out of sight before i could get his attention.
content.summary: I was watching geese fly over i saw cigar shaped object moving fast toward new orleans. no sound. no wings. could see clearly.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside my house to smoke and was facing north.I then seen what i thought was a small airplane,but there were to many lghts on it,so i ran in the house to grab my binoculars(10x50), as i looked i seen multiply lights and noticed that its was going in a large circle.The more times i seen it as it passed close to the big beam light from the luxor i could make out that it was a helicopter, after about 10 mins.And not understanding what it was doing,i glanced to the left and saw 5 lights in a row with space between them. frist thing i thought was where they come from,as i watched and tryed to get an understanding of what i was seeing,they disappeared,or turned off(saw for 10 to 15mins.) seeing the helicopter still circling,i thought to myself they didint in no way seem like 5 lights on 5 objects but rather 5 lights on one object.After about 5 or10 mins.Just like that, there they were again,only this time they seem to have gone higher,although not much.They never moved independly just stay still,speechless and confused they just turned off again.(saw for good 15mins.) i tryed looking where they were with the binoc's but never saw them again,,after 20|30 mins. of seaching,the wifey finally came out yelling that dinner was done,went in to eat.(end)
content.summary: 5 lights in a stright line,almost sure one object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving dwn the road came to a stop and saw a couple of bright lights and thought that is wierd. then i thought, could it be (a ufo) then i saw a plane i said i need to take a pic. i had to turn right as i was at the stop sign. then i snapped a quick pic. i thought to myself i have photgraphed an ufo. then i drove down the road to pull over and look some more. then they vanished and i continued to go on my commute.
content.summary: Ufo hovered then moved slowly east lowering in altitude then vanished. other ufo hovered then vanished apparently to the southern hemisphere.

content.detailedDescription:
Ich war mit meinem freund und einem kumpel auf unserem balkon und schauten uns den sonnen untergang an.
dann fiel mir ein großes fliegendes objekt auf und zeigte darauf und die anderen beiden schauten auch hin.
wir konnten es nicht zuordnen, es sah aus wie eine große schwebende festung, ca. 1 km von uns entfernt und ca. 1-2 km hoch in der luft.
 es bewegte sich von rechte nach links, über den wald, es war nicht sehr schnell unterwegs. es war langsamer als ein flugzeug.
es sah stachelig aus und nach unten hin wurden die "stacheln" länger, nach obenhin kürzer. 
es sah aus als währe es komplett von stacheln umgeben.
das objekt schien etwas zu suchen, hielt aber nicht an.
mein freund, unser kumpel und ich, konnten uns nicht erklären was dieses objekt sein soll, da die form und schwebe art, wie wir sie sahen, uns in deutschland nicht bekannt ist und auch nichts kennen was optisch in deutschland so aussieht, ebenso sind wir nicht in einer nähe von einem flughafen oder ähnliches.
wir waren uns nicht sicher was wir sahen, wir hatten sogar einen scherz darüber gemacht, dass wir alle drei uns so etwas wohl eingebildet haben, aber wir hatten es alle drei gesehen!

wir sahen auch öfters zwischen 00 uhr und 4 uhr morgends (deutsche zeit) helle lichter am himmel, die aussahen wie sterne, dann langsam bewegten und plötzlich immer schneller wurden und wie eine sternschnuppe verschwanden.
auch wenn ich abends mit meinem hund laufe, sehe ich so etwas regelmäßig mit meinem freund um die oben genannte zeit.

außer wir drei untereinander weiß keiner davon, da wir der meinung sind, dass die leute uns für verrückt halten würden und es uns keiner glauben würde.

nach bedarf kann ich auch eine skizze zeichnen, wie es ungefähr aussah.
content.summary: Fliegende festung ähnlich + mehrfache sichtung als lichtstreifen

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10 pm local time i left my house to take my dog for a walk. the sky was mostly clear aside from some distant clouds. i really enjoy space and the night was dark so i was looking up at the sky trying to find stars and satellites etc. at this point i am maybe a quarter mile down the road from my house, if that.  

heading west down the road i noticed a bright light in the distance that i immediately thought was some absurdly bright star because of where it was on the horizon and how bright it was. but as it approached i then thought it was a strange airplane, because i could see red and blue lights to the side of the original bright light. i was confused because it looked at first like someone had mounted a huge flood light on a far away airplane. but as it approached, with my now heading east returning to my home, i realized it must've been the size of a minibus, possibly larger. first i was very curious and then i realized that this could be a ufo.

at this point it is headed directly over me and i am starting to panic. i was under a street light and my dog was also starting to get uncomfortable, so i grabbed him and hid in the shadow of a pine tree. the craft flies right over us, thus how i was able to get a good look at the bottom. the bottom looked like it had some sort of jet on it? they were too bright for me to see the real shape so i drew them as best i could.  the craft itself seemed to be hovering, the air around it shimmered as though heat was being given off. i am a poor judge of feet but it was maybe 500ft up? the way i described it to my mother was that on a very windy day i probably could've flown a kite up to that height. it looked to be a dark grey/light grey/black and the jets were an orange color almost. it also had jets on the back. jets probably isn't the right word for it but i have no words to describe them. they could also have been heat vents now that i think about the structure. 

so this thing hovers/flies over us, heading east. it's not directly above me but only slightly north. i am terrified and hiding in the shadows, a human in a craft at that altitude would definitely have spotted me in the light. it keeps heading east, moving very slowly. eventually it starts slowly turning south and i'm starting to worry it's coming back for us because of how strangely it turns. but thankfully it corrects itself and continues south, towards downtown milwaukee, almost looking like it's following the milwaukee river.

at this point i'm in panic mode and as soon as i felt it was a safe distance away i ran as fast as i could back home. when i checked the clock here it was 10:44.
content.summary: Walking dog when minibus sized ufo flew over my head

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from someone's house when around 6 o'clock my friends mom had spotted two aircraft and then i noticed three more aircraft flying very low. we kept driving and looking out the window when we passed through sun valley and saw a smaller aircraft hovering about someone's house so we pulled over and watched it for about 3 minutes until it started flying again. we continued driving and saw a much bigger one flying very slowly at a very low altitude. it flew directly over our car and you could clearly see the bottom of it. we kept driving and then once we got to spanish springs we saw 3 more. one was going very fast, like a jet, and the other two were triangular shaped and got slow. they were all also flying at a very low altitude. we were very concerned and sort of terrified and anxious. when we lost sight of it, it was because of how low it was flying and it'd disappear behind houses.
content.summary: We saw six to eight aircraft and have been seeing them since six o'clock pm. there were drone sized ones and airplane sized ones. one aircraft was spotted hovering over someone's house for about 3 minutes then continued to fly south east.

content.detailedDescription:
Context.
  
 setting:
 master bedroom, southwest corner of upper level in government quarters (family quarters) located at 242g beluga ave. on fort richardson army post.
 
 i was a spc4, in the mos 63b (wheeled vehicle/power generator mechanic)

 we were lying in bed, the bed faced east ,(headboard against west wall) the master bedroom window is on the south wall in this room. the windows were covered with aluminum foil and aluminum tape to keep the summer light out at "night" so we saw no craft outside the window.
  we had our second daughter in bed with us at the time. our daughter was a newborn no more than two months old. it was my wife that saw the object in our bedroom, hovering over our newborn daughter.
 by her account: she looked at the object for some time, moved her hand between the object and our daughter which was oriented vertically along its long axis hovering above our daughter.

 as she observed it, she noticed or sensed that it was scanning the baby, then, an entity that she says looked like a classic grey alien, appeared in the room beside the bed. she exclaimed very loudly, "you cannot have my baby" which woke me from a dead sleep.I immediately sat up and scanned the room as i had been trained to do.I saw my wife clutching our daughter closely and was consciously in the fight mode. although i don't recall seeing anything that to me, posed a threat that moment, my wife was visibly shaken and definitely in the fight mode but in a protective posture. (don't know how else to describe it).
 she stated that when she yelled at the entity and woke me that both the entity and the "probe" seemed to "dematerialize" and were gone.

 later that night, we observed (both of us) an "entity" at the foot of our bed. this "entity" was so "dark" that its outline was clearly visible in the pitch black of our bedroom. 
 remember that there is no light from the window or the door, also covered with foil around the jamb and door joint and the window covered with aluminum foil and aluminum tape. it had a human form, and about the same average height as a human male. (5' 7") or so. it had dim glowing eyes. we were so freaked out that we stared yelling and throwing things toward it. it moved though the door and was gone. 

 we woke our other two children dressed everyone, and left our quarters. it was decided that we would not report this to the army for fear of being ostracized and or labeled crazy and being put out of the service.
content.summary: Cylinder ~25mm-30mm diameter, 15-25cm tall cylinder movements indicated a possible probe of some sort.

content.detailedDescription:
Edmonton
i was heading into work
i thought it was strange that the "helicopter was stationary and hoped there wasn't a big accident. it was extremely bright, like a white light. the sky was orange with morning light, but this was white light.
i thought it was a helicopter but it was not moving, just hovering in the sky being bright.
nothing happened, it simply hovered for a few minutes and when i reached down to have a sip of coffee, while stopped for a red light, it disappeared. i searched the sky for it, but it wasn't anywhere at all. there are no tall buildings for it to hide behind.
that's when i really thought, - wow that was weird, and looked again to see that i hadn't missed it anywhere. but it was just gone. 
i didn't really feel anything other than huh, was that a ufo? cool. i was wondering what that would be like.
content.summary: Bright light object in sky that hovered and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking cigarette with wife and son. looking up at stars and noticed a bright object in sky. moving towards us from wsw at a fairly rapid rate. looked like the brightest star you has ever seen. watched it long enough for me turn 45' toward the north. object then changed angle upwards and was gone in just a couple of seconds. obseved it turn into just a little dot as it went up.
content.summary: bright object moving towards us, some side movement then angle change and gone in one or two seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing on my private pier... i walked over to my home... i sat down on the steps and was putting a new bait on the hook when i seen what i seen.................. sincerly, bob carrigan
content.summary: Red soft ball size.. hoovered over my neighbors home... got my partner outside to witness what i had seen... my neighbor also witnessed this...

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke a cigarette when i noticed  a solid light gold and white looking it was moving very quickly  then i noticed a small airplane  reason i knew it was a small airplane cause it had the blinking  lights on it the other  did not the both where traveling south bound then the light got the distance  it wanted from the smaller aircraft  then just tailed  it then from the south heading north came a bigger aircraft  like a jet and when the jet got close to the light the light went dim  then i said to myself  that was weird  did not miss with my mind or it did not frighten  me just sees wire then i walk back in and sent this report to u all hope this helps
content.summary: It was following  a small airplane it was trailing the airplane i say 2 miles back then came another plan going north bond and the lights seem to dim

content.detailedDescription: Tonight. in a well lighted industrial area traveling on i 20/59 near the mercedes manufacturing plant near tuscaloosa, alabama, my wife and i observed a bright, white light across the western horizon. it moved from south to north, breaking into a smaller ascending diamond, with the larger piece staying near level.  the event lasted 1-2 seconds.  personally, i've seen shooting stars or meteors all my life ( i can remember seeing sputnik in 1957), but this was different from anything i have ever observed. as it broke across the horizon the light was so very bright (nothing could be observed normally because of all the light pollution and heavy interstate traffic in the area), but this light seemed strangely white- like phosphorous. i shall never forget it. my wife reported feeling strangely afraid after the incident.
content.summary: Traveling  west on interstate 20/59 near the mercedes manufacturing plant outside tuscaloosa we oberserved a bright, white light at 45 degrees above the horizon. it broke as one smaller piece climbed and the larger stayed near level

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were on our way home from work and she noticed some strange lights in the sky then i looked up and saw 3 round yellowish orange lights in the sky shaped like a triangle to the south then after a couple seconds they looked like they went above the clouds then we got home and took our dogs outsid andwe were looking at the sky for about 10 minutes and they appeared again tothe southeast but only 2 in a horizontal  line for about 15 seconds then just disappeared after looking aroud for a couple minutes it looked like there were about 5 airplane in the same area but to close together  to be planes after  they were gone nothing els appeared
content.summary: Driving down the road and saw 3 round lights in the sky shaped like a triangle appeared out of nowhere for about 5 seconds then i got hom and went my backyard and looked around and thet appeared again but this time only 2 in a horizontal line for about 15

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a dog outside when i noticed an owl flying from a tree in my side yard.  i pushed the dog into the backyard and went back to see if i could see the owl again.  that's when i spotted the triangle.  it seemed to be completely matte black, and had no lights on it.  i wouldn't have been able to see it had it not been low enough to the ground for the street lights to slightly illuminate it.

when i first spotted it, it was parallel to the ground with one point in the direction it was traveling.  i'll call this the nose.  the nose seemed to be slowly pitching down though it's altitude and path did not change.  to me, it seemed like gravity had no hold on it, and it did not appear to be powered up (but what do i know about these things?).  it moved slowly, maybe highway speeds, but almost certainly under 100mph, though its difficult to judge without knowing exactly how big or far away it was. 

it seemed to be mostly flat with some detail on it.  the object was a solid equilateral triangle with a height roughly 15-20% that of one of its sides.  the tail edge was broken up in a manner similar to the picture i've attached.  sorry for using a "classic" tr-3b image, but what i saw really did look like what you get when you plug tr3b into google.  however, in regards to the attached image, what i saw did not have a pyramid shape, the tips were more rounded, and it appeared to have "greebles" (for lack of a better word) on the surface.  as far as its size is concerned, it was larger than a cessna, but much smaller than the c-130s that fly around this area.

as far as the other bullet points listed:
3: i thought (and still do think) it was probably some top secret military air/space craft.

5: survival instinct triggered my fear response at first.  never seen anything like it, but that quickly dissipated into pure elation and joy.  i've been looking at the skies for years trying to spot something i couldn't immediately explain, and there it finally was.  the whole event lasted a matter of seconds.  i could have hit it with a green laser pointer, but that probably wasn't a good idea.  it might have a bigger laser, after all.  my pocket flashlight was too small to reach it, and neither my cell phone nor my dslr would have been able to focus or pick up enough light to get anything.  which brings me to...

6: i lost it behind some neighborhood trees.  like i said, it was low and i only spotted it because of a clearing where the neighbor's house is.

in closing, i got the distinct feeling this was a man made object.  i really have nothing to base that on, except nothing about it screamed "alien" to me.  maybe i've been jaded by years of sci-fi movies and tv.  anyway, feel free to contact me if you have any questions.  email is best.
content.summary: Spotted black triangle close to ground, appeared to slowly tumble.

content.detailedDescription: It was between 10 and 11 pm. i was out on my porch to have a cigarette before i called it a night. the porch faces north, and i always look at these 3 stars that are in a row to my left nw to see how clear the sky is. if i can see all 3 it's a clear night. ii didn't have my glasses on, but i noticed the far left star was super big and bright and it was getting bigger. i could see it getting bigger my thought was the star is blowing up! so i ran inside and got my glasses and ran back out to the porch. one of my friends was up for the weekend, and he was asleep,in the back room. i didn't even bother to wake him at that point because i didn't really know what i was looking at. so within 10 seconds i as back out on the porch, glasses on and now that light was approaching at a low altitude heading right for where i was. i could see the lights first. there was four of them, white, in a circle on the bottom. and then i saw a huge dark triangle  sillouette probably 200 ft across the widest point of the object. it was moving really slow and low. slow enough i could see the outline perfectly and the lights were not as bright as what i saw in the sky looking at the star. but he lights were inside a circle on the bottom of it and a blinking strobe on the right corner. first thing in my mind was seeing the strobe it had to be something made by the air force or something.  this isn't really happening.  but there was no noise! none, it wasn't a helicopter or anything i'd recognize. i was scared and frozen as i watched this thing pass in front of me. at this point it's just passing over and i ran in house to wake up my friend. yelling at him to get up as i'm running back outside...He probably thought i had just lost my mind! that took me maybe10-15  seconds before i was back outside. i saw the last part of it go over the few trees to my right and then i couldn't see it any more. no lights, no nothing. gone.  i looked all around for it and i didn't see it anymore. the funny thing is it all only took a few minutes but when i looked at the clock it was after  11:00pm. i didn't know who to tell. then i remembered mufon. do we (as in the us or the world ) have any kind of crafts like that? what did i just see? i'm on high alert now. and being the only one to see it and no camera or phone on me i didn't get a picture, i'm bummed about that. i know what i saw. i am anxious now and wondering what's next. leery to go to sleep.
content.summary: A big black triangle with 4 lights in a circle on the bottom center flew right in front of me.About 500-1000ft high.

content.detailedDescription: My friend was working on palomar mountain he's the one who took the picture
content.summary: Shiny disklike with dome. took off like a streak of light no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was between 10 and 11 pm. i was out on my porch to have a cigarette before i called it a night. the porch faces north, and i always look at these 3 stars that are in a row to my left nw to see how clear the sky is. if i can see all 3 it's a clear night. ii didn't have my glasses on, but i noticed the far left star was super big and bright and it was getting bigger. i could see it getting bigger my thought was the star is blowing up! so i ran inside and got my glasses and ran back out to the porch. one of my friends was up for the weekend, and he was asleep,in the back room. i didn't even bother to wake him at that point because i didn't really know what i was looking at. so within 10 seconds i as back out on the porch, glasses on and now that light was approaching at a low altitude heading right for where i was. i could see the lights first. there was four of them, white, in a circle on the bottom. and then i saw a huge dark triangle  sillouette probably 200 ft across the widest point of the object. it was moving really slow and low. slow enough i could see the outline perfectly and the lights were not as bright as what i saw in the sky looking at the star. but he lights were inside a circle on the bottom of it and a blinking strobe on the right corner. first thing in my mind was seeing the strobe it had to be something made by the air force or something.  this isn't really happening.  but there was no noise! none, it wasn't a helicopter or anything i'd recognize. i was scared and frozen as i watched this thing pass in front of me. at this point it's just passing over and i ran in house to wake up my friend. yelling at him to get up as i'm running back outside...He probably thought i had just lost my mind! that took me maybe10-15  seconds before i was back outside. i saw the last part of it go over the few trees to my right and then i couldn't see it any more. no lights, no nothing. gone.  i looked all around for it and i didn't see it anymore. the funny thing is it all only took a few minutes but when i looked at the clock it was after  11:00pm. i didn't know who to tell. then i remembered mufon. do we (as in the us or the world ) have any kind of crafts like that? what did i just see? i'm on high alert now. and being the only one to see it and no camera or phone on me i didn't get a picture, i'm bummed about that. i know what i saw. i am anxious now and wondering what's next. leery to go to sleep.
content.summary: A big black triangle with 4 lights in a circle on the bottom center flew right in front of me.About 500-1000ft high.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday night 03/21/2015 around 8:30pm i had this sudden urge to take my 2 year old son outside for a walk to look at the stars. we left our apartment complex neighborhood and followed a path that lead into a darker more secluded area with walkways and no street lights. this area is about a five minute walk from our apartment. there are walking paths that follow alongside a small flowing stream and trees. just a nice area to view the sky away from lights and buildings. i was carrying my son in my arms and walking when suddenly he says daddy look and points up, not directly above us, but up in front of us. i looked and pointed as well. what i saw shocked me. it was barely visible. i could barely see it, but could notice a very very large wide v or chevron shaped craft just hovering completely still. it was a very clear night no moon and the stars were clear. this thing blended in with the stars. it was completely still until a few seconds after we pointed at it, then it moved from east to west toward the rocky mountains directly over us. i could see the stars in the sky through this craft. almost as if it were glass or transparent. i only could see 7 orange yellowish circular lights under it as it flew over us. the lights were faded to the same brightness as the background stars but were much larger. the transparency was exactly like the predator in the predator movie with arnold. we could see just barely an outline and it somewhat distorted the stars in the sky above it as it moved. it moved in a solid straight path eastward. it was completely silent. no sound at all. it was hard to tell the size and altitude but i would say it was flying low, really low. like 500 or less feet maybe even 100 ft. i mean it was right there close gigantic in our face. it was bigger than our entire apartment building. we kept pointing and starring as it passed over us. it was hard to see when it was hovering, but easier to see as it moved over us and it faded as it kept moving west. eventually it just blended in with the night sky the farther it flew away. there was no emission no smoke or exhaust or afterburners or fire of any kind. absolutely no sound at all the entire time. no blinking or flashing lights. only the seven circular orange or yellowish lights underneath it. i couldn't really tell if there was more of a shape to the craft but i could kind of see it was a very wide v or chevron shape because of the transparent distortion of the background sky and the lights underneath. i was frightened and so was my son. we just got out there and after seeing this we were both ready to just go home. i felt very frightened more than anything, because of the size and the invisible stealth like qualities with no noise so close almost felt like we were being stalked. i also found it spooky that i had a sudden urge to go out there at that time. i have had a few other ufo encounters in the past few years. this was the scariest one. i was excited to see it, but it frightened me and my son.

not sure if we just happened to stumble upon some sort of secret military surveillance drone or if it was something else. even though we were both scared after witnessing it, i continued to walk further down the path and i also noticed headlights driving on the path that no public vehicles were allowed. as we went further i was also aware of 2 suvs that seemed out of place just parked with their headlights on the side of a rd to our right as we went further down the walk way. there was also this green laser like dot i could see moving away from us as we walked. i became fixated on it wanting to know what it was. it was far ahead of us but in the obvious walking path area. it could have just been some person with a green laser or a very bright green light of some kind. and maybe the suvs were just there parking to go to somebody's  house. i just had a strange sense about it all. it just did not logically match any known craft.  very spooky!
content.summary: Night walk with 2 year old son who pointed up at very large transparent hovering wide v shaped craft with 7 lights that glided over us silently

content.detailedDescription: Video taping ocean on my cell phone posted to facebook and at least three people said they saw black things flash in sky then at end of video looks like three black things fly quickly across screen - i didn't notice these when i was filming could be birds but can't tell taken with iphone 6 camera phone
content.summary: Video tape ocean something in sky

content.detailedDescription: I have 100,s of hours of vidio of all this ...Need some one to look at them.....
content.summary: Been goin on for 6 years fin amazing

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside, observing the sky and stars while letting my puppy out like always, when all of the sudden i saw a bright flash in the sky. at first it the size of a large star, and i started to hear a faint humming noise, like my dryer was running, but it was not. quickly the light split into a triangular shaped object that flashed and blinked from about 3 to 5 minutes, and then vanished. i only recorded a bit of it because i wasn't sure what i was witnessing, and was quite startled. 
i saw 2 different ufo's which i sent both to a friend/astronomer/astrophysicsist that used to work at nasa the first video, he told me may be a tumbling satellite. the second, he said he tried to break down the video, and look closer and he still had no idea what it could be.
content.summary: It changed size and sound and sound quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I was out chopping wood in our back yard of our home in stoughton  with a hatchet when i saw several flashes of light. the entire sky was blanketed with clouds but looking up i could clearly see a bright blue light. this wasn't the first time i witnessed such a phenomenon, back on november 22, when a snowstorm hit i was sitting out on the front porch enjoying a cup of hot chocolate when a i saw one flash of light. this time however, the bluish light flashed several times, illuminating the clouds. it could have been lighting though i heard no thunder at all. i called my father outside to witness the phenomenon and his best guess was that it was an airplane though neither  after viewing the flashes which occurred every 1-2 minutes we decided to head inside.
content.summary: Saw several flashes of lighting like light.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was on the porch smoking a cigarette when i noticed a strange circular rainbow around the sun. i took my phone from my pocket and took some pictures and in the pictures revealed a big red eyeball shaped ship within the rainbow. it was invisible to the eye at first. it's easier to hide from a biological eye but not from a digital "eye". in fact it seemed to know that we seen it because it then was visible for a brief time. 
it moved around a bit but mostly just hovered. the object did not seem to accelerate, it seemed to me like the ship tore a hole in the fabric of time-space and disappeared. i watch the sky every night and sometimes during the day. in fact, the strangest things i've seen have been during the day. i was happy to capture the undeniable fact that i was looking at something made by higher intelligence. the one odd thing about after the sighting was very lucid nightmares.
content.summary: I seen a peculiar rainbow around the sun. i snapped pictures with my phone. they revealed a big red eyeball shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out of the window at home on 1 december at about 22.35hrs and noticed an object which i had seen two nights earlier. i observed what i thought was a star (both on the first and second night). it caught my attention, because it was overly bright. it twinkled like a star to the naked eye and hovered and stayed in the same position for quite some time on both nights.

on the first night, i periodically viewed the object, went away and then returned later to look at it again. i noticed that there had been movement to the right in my field of view when i returned to look at the object, but movement was imperceptible while standing looking at it. during my last viewing on the first night, i thought that the object was going to move behind the line of houses, however shortly before reaching the line of houses the object faded and disappeared. due to this sudden fading i thought that it must have been a chinese lantern. however, when i viewed the object on the second night, i changed my opinion.

on the second night i decided to try to video the object. unfortunately, i could only use my mobile phone to video the event, nevertheless i was astounded at what it revealed. i was disappointed at the quality of the video. a combination of the following affected the quality, resolution, low light, camera shake and foreground lights.

i took video footage with both standard resolution and also 4k. even though i filmed with 4k, i still got camera shake. the object was too far in the background to see properly. so i did the following, i viewed the video on my mobile phone, zoomed in, tried to progress the video a few frames at a time to try and freeze the object and eventually during one of the freeze frames i couldn't believe what i had captured. it wasn't a plane and it wasn't a helicopter. if it was a drone, i've never seen one like this. i saw, at first, three defined white lights in a compact triangle, moving the video forward i noticed four defined white lights in a compact square. forwarding again i noticed four compact lights, but this time the four defined lights appeared on a blurred, diamond shaped background; a square on a diamond. the object continued to alter in this fashion.

watching the video it is difficult to identify what is going on, so i froze the video and took a couple of screenshots which captured the lights as mentioned above.

the object had disappeared by the time i turned in on the second night, but i didn't witness its disappearance. to date, it hasn't returned as far as i know.

the object was viewed through a window, but no reflections interfered with the viewing of the object. i would recommend using some advanced video viewing technology to help to stabilise and isolate the object, to assist definition and to allow single frame advance to view the changing shape of the object. the video does not show the object in view until 1 minute and 29 seconds in and it appears in the sky above and to the right of the street light.
content.summary: Looked like a bright, twinkling star to naked eye, but video showed defined lights within a square. number of lights changed constantly.

content.detailedDescription: On dec. 6,2015 at about 7pm while looking out a 10th floor balcony window i noticed at least 10 or more bright white round orb shape objects appear in the northern sky over about a 30 minute time period. most appeared as single objects but one time two appeared at once side by side then moved above each at a very close distance. all these orbs dimed and moved in different directions to start but all moved to the west eventually and out of sight.
content.summary: Many orbs in northern sky

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch smoking a cigarette and i seen something very peculiar. it was a rainbow around the sun. i took my phone from my pocket and took a few pictures; pictures that revealed a big "red eyeball" inside the circle. it then became visible for a quick moment and seemed to slip right into a tear in the fabric of time space.
content.summary: I seen a peculiar circular rainbow. i took my phone out and began to take pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
Watching the dubai rugby sevens was recording the welsh team training
only noticed the object when i played back the video
a glitch on my slow mo video 
zooms past at lightening speed as it climbs into the sky 
curious to find out what it is 
didn't see it till the video was replayed
content.summary: Was watching the dubai rugby sevens i didn't see the ufo at the time it was only when i played back the video i noticed it if you slow it down on 33 seconds you may be able to freeze the frame

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out and heard all the dogs in the neighborhood barking.  i noticed some lights moving in the sky overhead.  there were five lights that appeared to be shining through the cloud cover as if the objects were above the clouds and the light was shining through.  3 lights were in a triangular pattern and across from there were 2 more lights in a linear form.  they all rotated in a circular pattern.  the 2 linear lights would sporadically dart back and forth or across the circle but the 3 lights that formed a triangle were stationary as it moved around the circle.  at one point, my satellite dish went out for around 5 minutes.
content.summary: Five lights rotating in a circle.  3 in a triangular pattern, 2 in a line across from the triangle.  the 2 dots would change directions and shoot across the circle and back and forth rapidly.
